imdb.title: Ghost Hunt
imdb.plot: Shibuya Psychic Research Center investigates supernatural occurrences all over Japan.

episodes.title: Akurei ga ippai!? #1
episodes.plot: The Ghost-Hunting team gathers: a student, a monk, a Priest, a medium, a researcher, and girl that claims to be sensitive to ghostly entities. They all gather in an old school building attempting to solve a mystery.

episodes.title: Akurei ga ippai!? #2
episodes.plot: The team confirms there is some kind of poltergeist activity in the old school building after unexplainable things start to happen.

episodes.title: Akurei ga ippai!? #3
episodes.plot: Naru finds an explanation for the poltergeist activity in the old school, and Mai is officially hired at Shibuya Physic Research office.

episodes.title: Ningyo no ie #1
episodes.plot: The Shibuya Psychic Research team gathers in a mansion to try to solve some ghostly activity apparently related to a doll that belongs to a little girl.

episodes.title: Ningyo no ie #2
episodes.plot: The Shibuya Psychic research team finds out that a doll is just a vessel for what is really hunting the house and putting a little girl in risk.

episodes.title: Ningyo no ie #3
episodes.plot: The team solves the case of the haunted house, and finds out it was related to a child's disappearance many years ago.

episodes.title: Hôkago no jûsha #1
episodes.plot: The Shibuya Psychic Research time is called to a school to investigate a series of strange events related to a desk and a possible possession.

episodes.title: Hôkago no jûsha #2
episodes.plot: The team finds out that the strange happenings are related to someone summoning evil spirits through special dolls used in magic rituals.

episodes.title: Hôkago no jûsha #3
episodes.plot: After Naru and Mai fall into a sewer, they find a lot of cursed dolls, but the team still can't find out who is behind them.

episodes.title: Hôkago no jûsha #4
episodes.plot: Naru finds out who was behind the cursed Hitogata dolls cursing the students at the school where the team was hired.

episodes.title: Kôen no kaidan!?
episodes.plot: The team investigates a park where couples have water dumped on them from out of thin air.

episodes.title: Sairento kurisumasu #1
episodes.plot: The spirit of a young orphan randomly possesses the children of a church. As Mai follows the clues into the dense forest, the possession takes hold of her.

episodes.title: Sairento kurisumasu #2
episodes.plot: Mai has been possessed by Kenji, and unwittingly participates in his ritual of hide and seek - the very game that led to the boy's death.

episodes.title: Kinjirareta asobi #1
episodes.plot: A demon dog prowls Rokuryo High School, waiting to maul the unsuspecting. Whispers of a student's death prove the halls will need to be purged of the unholy remnants of childhood folly.

episodes.title: Kinjirareta asobi #2
episodes.plot: The campus is held captive by demons. As Mai blacks out during a phantom ambush, it becomes obvious that the members of the SPR might be in over their heads.

episodes.title: Kinjirareta asobi #3
episodes.plot: The ghost of a suicidal student has been swallowed by an ever-growing foxfire, and the SPR believes the threat was released with evil intention. While the scourge was meant for one teacher, everyone is at risk.

episodes.title: Kinjirareta asobi #4
episodes.plot: In order to save one soul, the entire student body will have to pay with their lives. As all gather in the auditorium, Mai confronts death in a pool of blood. The end is near for many.

episodes.title: Chi nurareta meikyû #1
episodes.plot: People are vanishing within the walls of a strangely constructed house. A séance makes contact with pleading voices from beyond - "Someone please help. I don't want to die."

episodes.title: Chi nurareta meikyû #2
episodes.plot: While investigating the strange house, Mai is snatched by villains in lab coats and taken to a bloodstained torture chamber. Paralyzed, bound, with a blade at her throat, her screams of terror go unheard.

episodes.title: Chi nurareta meikyû #4
episodes.plot: Naru is now giving up because Urado was like a monster who cannot be exorcised. Meanwhile packaging their stuff Masako went missing.

episodes.title: Noroi no ie #1
episodes.plot: The SPR team encounters their most horrifying case yet. A child has been marked for death by something awful from beyond. When the evil spirit is driven out, it quickly takes another host - Naru.

episodes.title: Noroi no ie #3
episodes.plot: Mai's abilities reveal treachery and tangled souls seeking rebirth at the foot of a cliff. The SPR must fight for their very lives when a massive horde of the undead attacks.

episodes.title: Noroi no ie #4
episodes.plot: The team is exhausted, outnumbered, and near defeat. Ayako draws out the spirits of the enslaved, releasing Naru from his unnatural slumber. Now, the fate of his friends is in his hands.
